Accept Sapphire Crest Hotel Home About Us Casino Contacts Home About Us Casino Contacts Welcome to Sapphire Crest Hotel Discover the ultimate urban oasis at Sapphire Crest Hotel, where luxury meets comfort in the heart of the city. Our hotel offers world-class amenities, exquisite dining experiences, and unparalleled service to ensure that your stay is nothing short of exceptional. EXPLORE ROOMS Prime Location Located in the heart of the city, Sapphire Crest Hotel offers easy access to popular attractions, shopping centers, and business districts. Luxurious Rooms Experience ultimate comfort in our elegantly designed rooms, equipped with modern amenities and stunning views. World-Class Dining Indulge in a variety of gourmet dining options, featuring international cuisines prepared by top chefs. Exceptional Service Our dedicated staff is committed to providing personalized service to ensure a memorable stay for every guest. Airport Transfer Service At Sapphire Crest Hotel, we understand that the beginning and end of your journey are just as important as your stay with us. Thatâ€™s why we offer a seamless and comfortable airport transfer service designed to ensure your travels are as stress-free as possible. Whether you're arriving or departing, our dedicated team is here to assist you with all your transportation needs. Upon your arrival at the airport, you will be warmly greeted by one of our professional drivers holding a sign with your name on it. Our drivers are highly trained, courteous, and knowledgeable about the local area, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable ride to our hotel. Our fleet of luxury vehicles is well-maintained and equipped with modern amenities to provide you with the utmost comfort. We offer a variety of vehicle options to accommodate your specific needs, whether you're traveling alone, with a partner, or with a group. From sleek sedans to spacious SUVs and even larger vans for group travel, we have the perfect vehicle to suit your requirements. All our vehicles are air-conditioned and feature complimentary Wi-Fi, bottled water, and a selection of reading materials for your convenience. Discover Our Comprehensive Services Dining Placement Events & Meetings Spa & Wellness Our Staff Our front desk personnel consistently provide warm welcomes and efficient service, ensuring every guest feels valued from the moment they arrive. The housekeeping staff demonstrates meticulous attention to detail, maintaining impeccably clean rooms and ensuring guest comfort throughout their stay. In addition, our technical service team promptly and proactively resolves any issues that arise, ensuring uninterrupted service to our guests at all times. In conclusion, the teamwork and dedication of our hotel staff have significantly contributed to our reputation for excellence. SAPPHIRE CREST HOTEL Discover the epitome of luxury and comfort at Sapphire Crest Hotel, where every detail is crafted with your utmost satisfaction in mind. pages.privacy-policy: Sapphire Crest Hotel - Exquisite Comfort and Style × Are you at least 18 years old? Yes No This website uses cookies to enhance user experience. Click "Accept" to continue using the site. Accept Sapphire Crest Hotel Home About Us Casino Contacts Home About Us Casino Contacts Privacy Policy Welcome to Sapphire Crest Hotel's Privacy Policy. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Sapphire Crest Hotel website, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, when you participate in activities on the website or otherwise when you contact us. The personal information we collect can include the following: Name and Contact Data: Your first and last name, email address, postal address, phone number, and other similar contact data. Payment Data: Your payment method, including credit card number, expiration date, billing address, and security code. Credentials: Passwords, password hints, and similar security information used for authentication and account access. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect or receive: To facilitate account creation and logon process. To manage your reservations and bookings. To communicate with you, including sending you updates, promotional materials, and other information that may be of interest to you. To enhance and improve our services and offerings. To protect the security and integrity of our services and to prevent fraudulent activities. How We Share Your Information We do not share, sell, or disclose your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances: With your consent or at your direction. With service providers who perform services on our behalf. As required by law or to comply with legal processes. In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets. Data Security We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Your Rights You have certain rights regarding your personal information, including the right to access, correct, delete, or object to the processing of your personal information. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at sapphirecrest@gmail.com Sapphire Crest Hotel Home About Us Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer

Accept Sapphire Crest Hotel Home About Us Casino Contacts Home About Us Casino Contacts About Sapphire Crest Hotel Welcome to Sapphire Crest Hotel, where luxury meets comfort. At Sapphire Crest, we pride ourselves on offering impeccable service and unparalleled amenities. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, our goal is to ensure your stay exceeds expectations. Our commitment to excellence extends to every aspect of your experience, from our elegantly appointed rooms and suites to our world-class dining options and state-of-the-art facilities. Our History Founded in 1980 by John Doe, Sapphire Crest Hotel began as a modest establishment with a vision to redefine luxury hospitality. From its humble beginnings with just 50 rooms, the hotel quickly gained a reputation for its exceptional service and commitment to guest satisfaction. Throughout the years, Sapphire Crest Hotel has undergone several expansions and renovations to meet the growing demands of travelers seeking comfort and elegance. In 1995, a new wing was added, doubling the hotel's capacity and introducing modern amenities. The turn of the millennium marked a significant milestone with a major renovation project that transformed Sapphire Crest into a beacon of luxury. State-of-the-art technology and luxurious accommodations became synonymous with the hotel's brand. Our Values Integrity We conduct ourselves with honesty, transparency, and respect. Integrity is at the core of our operations, guiding our decisions and interactions to build trust and long-term relationships. Guest Satisfaction Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We listen to our guests' needs and preferences, anticipating their desires to provide personalized experiences that leave a lasting impression. Sustainability We are committed to environmental responsibility. Through sustainable practices and initiatives, we strive to minimize our environmental footprint while enhancing the well-being of our surroundings and community. Excellence We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service. From the moment guests arrive to their departure, we aim to exceed expectations with impeccable service, luxurious accommodations, and attention to detail. Our Team Emily Smith General Manager Jane Doe Head of Guest Relations Customer Reviews My stay at Sapphire Crest Hotel was absolutely delightful. The room was spacious and beautifully decorated, with stunning views of the city. The staff went above and beyond to ensure I had everything I needed. I especially enjoyed the breakfast buffetâ€”it was delicious and offered a wide variety of choices. I highly recommend this hotel and look forward to visiting again! John I had a fantastic experience at Sapphire Crest Hotel. The location is perfect, close to shopping and dining options. The room was spotless and well-appointed, providing a comfortable retreat after a busy day of meetings. The staff was friendly and attentive, making me feel welcomed throughout my stay. I would definitely choose this hotel again for my next business trip. Sarah Staying at Sapphire Crest Hotel was like a dream come true. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism. The hotel's amenities are top-notch, including the spa services which were incredibly relaxing. The room was luxurious, and the view from my balcony was breathtaking. Thank you for making my vacation unforgettable! Linda The attention to detail and personalized service make each visit special. The hotel's spa treatments are rejuvenating, and the fitness center is well-equipped. Whether for business or leisure, this hotel never disappoints. Thank you to the entire team for consistently delivering exceptional hospitality. Michael Sapphire Crest Hotel Home About Us Contact Casino Privacy Policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer

Our commitment to excellence ensures that every visit to Sapphire Crest Casino is unforgettable. Step into Luxury and Excitement at Sapphire Crest Casino Sapphire Crest Casino is a premier gaming and entertainment destination, offering a wide range of gaming options, luxurious accommodations, fine dining, and world-class entertainment. Located in the heart of the city, our casino is designed to provide an unforgettable experience for every guest, whether you are here to play, dine, relax, or celebrate. Our gaming floor features over 1,000 slot machines, ranging from classic reels to the latest video slots. With denominations to suit every budget, our slot machines offer endless excitement and the chance to win big. For those who prefer table games, we have over 100 tables offering a variety of games including blackjack, roulette, craps, baccarat, and poker. Our professional dealers and friendly staff are dedicated to providing a top-notch gaming experience for all our guests. Casino Games and Tournaments Slot Machines Step into the vibrant world of slot machines at Sapphire Crest Casino, where excitement and fortune await at every spin. Our casino boasts an extensive collection of state-of-the-art slot machines, catering to all types of players, from novices to seasoned enthusiasts. With hundreds of machines to choose from, featuring a wide array of themes, graphics, and gameplay styles, there's always something new and exciting to discover. Table Games Welcome to the thrilling world of table games at Sapphire Crest Casino, where tradition meets excitement and every hand is a new opportunity to win big. Our casino floor features a wide variety of classic and modern table games that cater to all levels of players, from beginners to seasoned pros. Whether you prefer the strategic challenge of blackjack or the fast-paced action of craps, you'll find your favorite games and much more. Live Tournaments Welcome to the exhilarating world of live tournaments at Sapphire Crest Casino. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a newcomer to the scene, our live tournaments offer an unmatched gaming experience filled with excitement, strategy, and the potential for big rewards. We host a wide range of tournaments that cater to all skill levels and interests, ensuring that every player has the opportunity to compete and win. VIP Services At Sapphire Crest Casino, we believe in providing our distinguished guests with an unparalleled level of service and luxury. Our VIP Services are designed to cater to your every need, ensuring that your experience with us is nothing short of exceptional. From personalized attention to exclusive amenities, we go above and beyond to make your visit truly memorable.
